title: Modern Mangalsutra Necklace with Diamond Pendants
features: Delicate black beaded chain with alternating rose gold spacers and geometric diamond-studded pendants. The square shaped CZ pendants are arranged symmetrically along the necklace, offering a modern minimalist design. Contemporary interpretation of traditional Mangalsutra.
description: This Mangalsutra presents a contemporary take on a traditional symbol of marriage, blending cultural significance with a modern aesthetic. The delicate design and high-quality materials ensure both durability and elegance. The rose gold finish provides a warm, flattering glow. Ideal for the modern woman who values tradition with a touch of contemporary style.
